total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the size of the input grid.
Q2: Create a new grid that is three times the size of the input grid.
Q3: Copy the input grid into the top right, middle, and bottom left quadrants of the new grid.
Q4: Fill the remaining cells of the new grid with 0s.
